thread.title: Windows 10 Now Supports Apple 3D Touch-like Context Menus
thread.title_full: Windows 10 Now Supports Apple 3D Touch-like Context Menus - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Windows 10 Now Supports Apple 3D Touch-like Context Menus
text: Apple’s 3D Touch, currently available on Apple Watch, iPhone 6s/6s Plus, and MacBooks, provides users with a new way to perform certain tasks faster by detecting different levels of pressure on the screen to display available options for various apps. As we told you in our iPhone 6s Plus review, the 3D Touch feature is more or less a touch-o... »
